











* FColor
{{{class="brush:c++"
	FColor::Yellow
	FColor(255,0,0);
}}}

* DrawDebug Function
{{{class="brush:c++"
	// 画线
	DrawDebugLine(
		GetWorld(),
		StartFVector,
		EndFVector,
		FColor::Yellow,
		bPersistant = false,
		fLifeTime = -1,
		uint8DepthProperty = 0,
		Thickness = 0
	)
	
	// 画点
	// 第三个参数是尺寸，大了的话，是方形了
	DrawDebugPoint(
		GetWorld(),
		InPlayerController->GetFocalLocation(),
		20,
		FColor::Red,
		true
	);
	
	// 画有向箭头
	// 第四个参数是射线箭头的尺寸
	DrawDebugDirectionalArrow(
		GetWorld(),
		WorldBoundPoints[0],
		FrustumRays[0] * 30000 + WorldBoundPoints[0],
		5,
		FColor::Green,
		true
		);
}}}
